c74object.name: mx-b
c74object.digest: Generate rhythms by balancing a group of pairs
c74object.description: mx-b generates and outputs a three-part rhythmical pattern from the sequence of a two-generator interference (see mxp1), a two generator fractioned interference (see mxp2) and an additional note. This produces a "balance" between the two groups, according to Chapter 5 of Schillingers book.

outlet.description: According to the formula n = a - b + 1, this outlet will output b patterns b0-bn in the format b0patbin(list).

method.name: gen
method.description: The gen message generates and outputs a three-part rhythmical pattern. The periodicity of the generators must be included as arguments to this message. The syntax is thus: gen gena (int) genb (int).

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs the resulting patterns calculated from the arguments or gen message.
